name: Stick To It (EmergencyPlayer, Haru19, Sleir, CapBarbosa)
name_original: Stick To It (EmergencyPlayer, Haru19, Sleir, CapBarbosa)
description:
This is our submission for the GMTK Game Jam of 2021 and the theme of "Joined Together".

Stick To It follows the theme of Joined Together as it focuses on shooting platforms to stick or JOIN together in order to help the player get to the flag. Whether this means using it as a bridge, a jumping platform, or even for a speed boost, the player will always find some way to stick the platforms together.

Shoot two platforms to join them together, Press R to reset the level and ESC to pause the game

This was most of our teams first game Jam and it was a great experience working with them all

This game was made by Jason H, Laurence G, Taehyuan H, Thomas B.
